p: The chelating activities of pomegranate leaves and peels, fig leaves, guava leaves and olive leaves crude juices were determined following the method described by Oche et al. [ 13]. The absorbance at 510 nm was recorded using a UV–vis spectrophotometer (Shimadzu, UVmini-1240, Japan). Ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid (EDTA) was utilized as a standard.
